value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Akemashite...omedetou...gozaimasu!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What does that mean? The way you
said it, it sounded like a very polite
greeting!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|That's right! It's another Hoshidan
New Year's greeting. Akemashite
omedetou gozaimasu!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Akemashite... Omedetou gozaimasu!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Happy New Year!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Happy New Year to you, too!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Er, Sharena? Commander Anna?
We'd better get going.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_年明レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_NewYear19,Face|What a curious thing, this summoning.
Strange to find ourselves together like
this, isn't it, Princess Fjorm?$k$pThere are so many different realms...$k$p$WmMPID_年明フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_NewYear19,Face|Yes, it is strange. But I am glad it
happened.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_NewYear19,Face|Their strength outmatched ours. Let's
join Laevatein and Princess Gunnthrá.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_NewYear19,Face|As you say.$k$p$Sbs150|
